html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-03062016-05-06,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActNuclear Liability and Compensation Act
SubjectNuclear Liability and Compensation Regulations
PrecisNUCLEAR LIABILITY AND COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) designate which nuclear facilities will be subject to the Act; (2) establish classes or categories of nuclear installations and their respective liability amounts, so that operators are held responsible and accountable to the Canadian public for any incident that may occur at their installations; and (3) repeal the Canada-United States Nuclear Liability Rules.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0088 Publication Date: 2016-05-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Nuclear Liability and Compensation Regulations
precis: NUCLEAR LIABILITY AND COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) designate which nuclear facilities will be subject to the Act; (2) establish classes or categories of nuclear installations and their respective liability amounts, so that operators are held responsible and accountable to the Canadian public for any incident that may occur at their installations; and (3) repeal the Canada-United States Nuclear Liability Rules.
